name: THEY
description:
A group of nice people in Amsterdam and Delhi who love change. 
THEY believe in creativity as an agent for change.
Coupled with technology, change can be immediate.
With the foresight of strategy, it can be long-lasting. 
THEY help brands to influence the way people interact with and talk about a brand. 
And the way an organization behaves and earns money. THEY create campaigns, platforms and services that make positive change happen.
